        private void toggle_active(boolean play,
                           boolean destroy)
        Changes the active audio `thing` states.
        Parameters:
        play - true to play, false to pause
        destroy - AudioPlayer.destroy() trigger that takes precedence over `play`

      • onRequestPermissionsResult

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
                                       @NonNull
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions,
                                       @NonNull
                                       int[] grantResults)
        Where we respond to permissions user response. Whatever happens, we fire Application.run().
        Specified by:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in interface android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback
        Overrides:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        Parameters:
        requestCode - Exactly Constants.PERMISSION_REQUEST_CODE
        permissions - An array of requested permissions
        grantResults - An array of request responses' matching permissions' requests
